editClosestKey.name: Edit Closest Waypoint
editClosestKey.description: Edit the closest waypoint within 15 Blocks to your current position.

alwaysShowWaypoints.name: Scale Dynamically
alwaysShowWaypoints.description: Whether the Waypoints should scale dynamically (to be visible on a long distance) or always be the same size.

hideWhenOutOfRange.name: Hide Out of Range
hideWhenOutOfRange.description: Whether the Waypoints should be hidden when they are out of range.

outOfRangeDistance.name: Out of Range Distance
outOfRangeDistance.description: The distance in blocks at which the Waypoints should be hidden.

fadeOut.name: Fade Out Before Hiding
fadeOut.description: Whether the Waypoint should fade out before it is out of range.

showHudIndicators.name: Show Waypoint HUD indicators
showHudIndicators.description: Indicators for Waypoints behind the player will be displayed in the HUD.

remove.title: Do you really want to remove this waypoint?

overview.temporary: This waypoint will be deleted once you disconnect from this server.
